mapper.select: SELECT vote_no as voteNo ,user_no as userNo,enroll_date as enrollDate,start_date as startDate,end_date as endDate, title, content, item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, item6 from Vote
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Vote (vote_no, user_no, title, enroll_date, start_date, end_date, content, item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, item6) VALUES (seq_Vote.nextVal, 1,#{title},sysdate,sysdate,sysdate,#{content},#{item1},#{item2},#{item3},#{item4},#{item5},#{item6})
